p: On the contrary, regarding detection, the N-Gene of MERS-Coronavirus, the most contemporary study, has established the proof that (RT-LAMP-VF) a nucleic acid imagery method that incorporates the reverse transcription loop-mediated isothermal amplification method and a vertical flow visualization strip (RT-LAMP-VF) to be better than real-time RT-PCR (rRT-PCR) [46].
